attributes.action: Stricter Performance Management of Michael Gove
attributes.additional_details: Michael Gove's inability to keep a grip on reality has reached crisis point and intervention by his line management is now essential to help him.  Already obsessed with his flawed academies and free schools, he now wants hard-pressed taxpayers to pay for a new royal yacht!  He is currently unsuited for high office, so must "up his game" quickly or face dismissal in the interests of children and taxpayers.
